vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.26;
son of: Tahan (H8465H);
father of: Ammihud (H5989)
§ Laadan = "put in order"
1) an Ephraimite ancestor of Joshua, son of Nun
2) a Levite son of Gershom; also 'Libni'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Tahán; ancestro de Josué; tribu de Efraín; (b)   descendiente de Guersón; tribu de Leví
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉但 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "整理就序"
1) 以法蓮人,約書亞的先祖 (代上 7:26)
2) 革順的後裔
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
拉但 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "整理就序"
1) 以法莲人,约书亚的先祖 (代上 7:26)
2) 革顺的后裔

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.17;
son of: Gershon (H1648);
brother of: Shimei (H8096);
father of: Jahath (H3189H), Ladan (H3936I), Shimei (H8096W); also called Jahath at 1Ch.6.43; Ladan (KJV: Laadan) at 1Ch.23.7,9; 26.21;
Another name of liv.ni (לִבְנִי "Libni" H3845)
§ Laadan = "put in order"
1) an Ephraimite ancestor of Joshua, son of Nun
2) a Levite son of Gershom; also 'Libni'

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.7;
son of: Libni (H3845);
brother of: Shimei (H8096W), Jahath (H3189H);
father of:Jehiel (H3171H), Zetham (H2241), Joel (H3100O)
§ Laadan = "put in order"
1) an Ephraimite ancestor of Joshua, son of Nun
2) a Levite son of Gershom; also 'Libni'
